item.title: Truckers of Husk + Gallops + Kutosis Review
item.description: Last Saturday I went along to The Globe in Roath, accompanied by my excellent musical companion Ms. Jones (and joined later on by our token northener Mark)Â to watch a number of bands that we’d seen before, but in a new setting. This is a review of that what happened there. Let’s start with the venue, The Globe. The Globe is not the worst venue in Cardiff (Bogiez/Barfly, The SU Great Hall).
